Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
hinted_locations: LW Deku Scrub Near Deku Theater Left

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Fire Temple Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

DMT (Biggoron).text: If Gorons eat rocks, does that mean I'm in danger?

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo Valley# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path of #hearts#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

GV (Waterfall).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: It would be a shame if something... unfortunate... were to happen to you.^Have you considered saving lately?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Red Rupee#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.
